thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Steve Lane

author: Steve Lane
title: Steve Lane
text: We had a really great day with Ingrid and her knowledge of the area was excellent. She would answer our many questions without hesitation and provided tour which was interesting and memorable. It was particularly great that she adapted the itinerary as we went along to match the weather conditions and our interests. I would highly recommend Ingrid for a tour if you are visiting the Puerto Montt area.
